meta_description: Pinche Poutine: Creative web development and innovative animation projects.
hero_title: Digital Fusion for the Modern Web
hero_subtitle: Pioneers in accessible creativity using open-source tools and cutting-edge techniques.
feature_anim_desc: We bring static drawings to life. Using open-source tools like Wan Video and FFMPEG directly from the command line, we animate sketches on Chromebooks with professional-grade results.
feature_web_desc: Lightning-fast SvelteKit 5 apps deployed on Cloudflare Workers. High performance and low latency across North America.
feature_stack_desc: Specializing in Cloudflare Images, Stream, and secure DIY authentication using Lucia 3.0.
newsletter_subtitle: Subscribe for the latest tips on animation and web development.
about_subtitle: Building amazing experiences with modern web technologies
story_1: Founded with a passion for creating exceptional web experiences, ¡Pinche Poutine! Digital has been at the forefront of modern web development. We believe in the power of clean code, beautiful design, and user-centered thinking to create digital solutions that make a difference.
story_2: Our journey began with a simple mission: to help businesses and individuals establish a strong online presence through innovative web technologies. Today, we continue to push boundaries and explore new possibilities in the ever-evolving digital landscape.
mission_text: We are committed to delivering high-quality web solutions that not only meet our clients' needs but exceed their expectations. Our approach combines technical expertise with creative vision to build websites and applications that are both functional and beautiful.
val_innovation_desc: We stay ahead of the curve by embracing new technologies and methodologies.
val_quality_desc: Every project we deliver meets the highest standards of quality and performance.
val_collab_desc: We work closely with our clients to ensure their vision becomes reality.
val_growth_desc: We're committed to continuous learning and helping our clients grow.
team_text: Our diverse team of developers, designers, and digital strategists brings together years of experience and a shared passion for creating outstanding web experiences. We believe that great work comes from great people working together towards a common goal.
cta_text: Let's discuss how we can help bring your vision to life.
contact_error_server: Server configuration error. Please try again later.
contact_error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
contact_error_send_failed: Failed to send message. Please try again later.
contact_success_message: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon!
email_footer_text: This message was sent via your website contact form on
welcome_body: Thank you for confirming your email. You are now officially subscribed. We can't wait to share our latest animation projects and web dev tips with you.
welcome_footer: You received this email because you signed up on ¡Pinche Poutine! Digital
resend_body: You requested a new confirmation link. Click the button below to confirm your email address.
resend_footer: If you did not request this, please ignore this email.
unsubscribe_error_not_found: Email address not found in our records
unsubscribe_success: You have been successfully unsubscribed from all email updates.
goodbye_body: We're sorry to see you go. You've been successfully unsubscribed from our mailing list. If you ever want to jump back in for more animation or web tips, you know where to find us.
subscribe_subject: Confirm your email for ¡Pinche Poutine! Digital
subscribe_body: Thanks for signing up! To start receiving our spicy web dev tips, please confirm your email address by clicking the button below.
subscribe_footer: If you didn't sign up, you can safely ignore this email.
contact_subtitle: We'd love to hear from you and discuss your project
methods_desc: Have a project in mind or just want to say hello? We're here to help bring your ideas to life. Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
office_hours_note: All times in your local timezone
faq_q1: How long does a typical project take?
faq_a1: Project timelines vary based on complexity, but most websites take 2-6 weeks from start to finish.
faq_a2: Yes! We offer maintenance plans and ongoing support to keep your website running smoothly.
faq_a3: We work with modern technologies like SvelteKit, React, and deploy on platforms like Cloudflare.
faq_q4: Can you help with existing projects?
faq_a4: Absolutely! We can help improve, maintain, or completely redesign your existing website.
footer_tagline: Building amazing experiences with modern web technologies.
footer_newsletter_desc: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates.
blog_page_subtitle: Insights on web development, design, and digital marketing
blog_no_posts_text: We're working on some great content. Check back soon for our latest insights and articles.
blog_newsletter_desc: Subscribe to our newsletter and get the latest articles delivered to your inbox.
services_subtitle: Comprehensive solutions to help your business thrive online
services_intro_desc: We specialize in creating modern, high-performance web solutions that drive results. From custom websites to complex web applications, we have the expertise to bring your vision to life and help your business succeed in the digital world.
services_custom_desc: Build powerful, scalable web applications using cutting-edge technologies like SvelteKit, React, and Node.js. We create solutions tailored to your specific business needs.
services_website_desc: Create stunning, responsive websites that engage your audience and convert visitors into customers. Every site is optimized for performance and SEO.
services_cloud_desc: Deploy your applications on modern cloud platforms like Cloudflare Workers, Vercel, or AWS for maximum performance and reliability.
services_email_desc: Build and manage effective email marketing campaigns with custom newsletter systems, automation workflows, and detailed analytics.
services_mobile_desc: Ensure your web presence works flawlessly on all devices with our mobile-first approach to development and progressive web app solutions.
services_perf_desc: Speed up your existing website with our comprehensive performance optimization services. Faster sites mean better user experience and higher search rankings.
services_process_step1_desc: We start by understanding your business goals, target audience, and technical requirements.
services_process_step2_desc: Our team creates wireframes, designs, and develops your solution using modern best practices.
services_process_step3_desc: Rigorous testing ensures your site works perfectly across all devices and browsers.
services_process_step4_desc: We deploy your site and provide ongoing support to keep it running smoothly.
services_cta_desc: Let's discuss your project and find the perfect solution for your business needs. Get in touch for a free consultation.
services_page_subtitle: If it's the right fit, I'd love to work with you
services_intro_1: I'm selective about what I work on, but I'm always open to interesting collaborations. If you're an artist, animator, writer, or want to build a web app—let's talk.
services_intro_2: No long-term commitments. No projects I don't believe in. Just good work with good people.
services_help_desc: Got an interesting problem? Let's solve it together:
services_help_skills: I'm good at: SvelteKit 5, Cloudflare Workers, edge-native architecture, DIY auth, automating boring stuff with Bash.
services_process_terminal_desc: If it has a GUI, I probably don't use it. Bash + Vim + FFMPEG is my happy place.
services_process_video_desc: FFMPEG from the command line. No mouse. No timeline editors. Just scripts.
services_process_svelte_desc: Runes, JSDoc, no TypeScript drama. Clean, fast, edge-native.
services_process_cloudflare_desc: Workers, D1, Images, Stream—no traditional servers. Global by default.
services_process_ai_desc: I pair-program with AI agents. They don't complain about my hours.
services_process_summary: This means: Fast iteration, minimal overhead, no hand-holding.
services_projects_note: This is the kind of thing I enjoy building. If you want something similar, let's talk.
services_contact_intro: If you're an artist, animator, writer, or want to build a web app—send me an email and we'll take it from there.
services_contact_outro: No pressure. No sales pitch. If it's a fit, great. If not, no hard feelings.
home_hero_subtitle: I build edge-native web apps and automate creative workflows. SvelteKit 5, Cloudflare, Bash, FFMPEG—no GUI required.
home_about_text1: I live in Guadalajara, México and like in-person collaboration best—at least to start or at some point in the process.
home_about_text2: I'm semi-retired and intentionally selective about what I work on. That said, if you've got an interesting project and we get along, I'm open to collaborating.
home_about_text3: My workflow: Terminal-first, AI-assisted, and mouse-optional. If it has a GUI, I probably don't use it.
home_process_terminal_desc: Bash + Vim + FFMPEG. If it has a GUI, I probably don't use it.
home_process_svelte_desc: Runes, JSDoc, no TypeScript drama. Clean, fast, edge-native.
home_process_cloudflare_desc: Workers, D1, Images, Stream—no traditional servers.
home_process_ai_desc: I pair-program with AI agents. They don't complain about my hours.
project_antoine_desc: Digital gallery for illustrator Antoine Patraldo. SvelteKit 5, Cloudflare Workers, DIY auth (Web Crypto API), FFMPEG + Bash for video processing. Zero GUI, zero traditional servers.
project_pinche_desc: This site. Creative web development and animation projects. SvelteKit 5 on Cloudflare with full i18n (EN/FR/ES), DIY email subscription, and blog with Mermaid diagrams.
project_patrouch_desc: Personal portfolio and digital presence. Clean, fast, edge-native architecture with minimal dependencies and maximum performance.
